cobblemon.species.weenut.name: Weenut
cobblemon.species.weenut.desc1: Weenuts are shy pokemon, often digging themselves into the ground at the sight of danger, only leaving their sprout visible.
cobblemon.species.legallus.name: Legallus
cobblemon.species.legallus.desc1: When weenuts grow confident enough, they burst out of their own shells, growing into mighty dragons.
